author: Yuthika Bhargava
text:
The regulation that mobile phone users be paid a compensation of Rs. 1 for every call dropped, up to a maximum of three calls a day, will come into effect on January 1, TRAI chairman R.S. Sharma said.

At the last hearing, the Delhi High Court asked the regulator not to take coercive action against operators till the next hearing on January 6.
title: Re. 1 for every call drop: TRAI
